Simply use the coupon "VPS20L" on your order and receive 20% off for your recurring payment to UnderHost.

This coupon code is available on all VPS USA based.

Coupon expire on 30sept 2011

Are you looking for a solid host? Look no further.
Come home to UnderHost, and stop travelling from host to host.

We transfer your current cPanel VPS and all account for free.

Since 2007 UnderHost, has been providing quality hosting based on a simple success formula, customer service, server uptime and integrity.

VPS Package List
USA: http://underhost.com/usa-ca-vps.php
Offshore: http://underhost.com/offshore-vps.php
Windows: http://underhost.com/windows-vps.php

Customer Service
We offer a true 24/7, 365 day Help Desk Availability.

We use several strategies to keep our Help Desk online where other hosts do not. Employing redundant Internet connections is just one way that UnderHost, ensures availability of our staff to you at all times. Our support staff use English as a first language and possesses graduate-level communication skills we offers also french service for european customers.

Server Uptime
UnderHost, offers a 99.9% uptime guarantee.
That means your Web site is guaranteed operational 99.9% of the time in any calendar month.

Parallels® Virtuozzo Containers
UnderHost, provide the industry-leading virtualization software on the market today designed to isolated virtual environments on a single physical server and OS instance. Compared to other virtualization technologies, Parallels Virtuozzo Containers offers the highest levels of density, performance and manageability.

Free cPanel/WHM®
cPanel/WHM - Powerful Hosting Administration Automation gives you tools to keep servers secure, provision customer accounts, transfer accounts from server to server and much more.

  • * Unlimited Domains per VPS server
  • * Fully Brandable
  • * Complete Server Administration Interface
  • * Separate Server Administrator, Reseller, and Domain Owner Interfaces
  • * Free Multi-Language Support
  • * Free Virus Scanner
  • * Free Game Servers


All of our servers feature Quad Intel Xeon processors with ECC Registered RAM and 300MB/s hot swap SATA II drives with a hardware RAID controller configured for RAID-10 for superior performance and fault tolerance. Our exact hardware configuration changes every 3-8 months to keep current with technology and the market.
